articles.author: Victoria Craw
articles.title: First malaria treatment for newborn babies approved for use - The Washington Post
articles.description: Malaria caused 597,000 deaths worldwide in 2023, with children under 5 accounting for 76 percent of all malaria deaths in the World Health Organization’s Africa region.
articles.content: The first malaria drug for newborn babies and those weighing less than 11 pounds has been approved by Swiss medical authorities in a move that could fill a treatment gap for some of those most vulner… [+4628 chars]
